import { useState } from 'react'; import Shell from '../components/shell'; import JobRow from './components/jobRow'; const jobs = [ { title: 'Software Engineer', created: '1 mo ago', numApplicants: "153 applicants", status: '23 unseen', location: "San Francisco, CA" }, { title: 'Manufacturing Engineer', created: '2 mo ago', numApplicants: "70 applicants", status: '5 unseen', location: "San Francisco, " }, { title: 'Electrical Engineer', created: '5 mo ago', numApplicants: "700 applicants", status: 'Fulfilled', location: "San Francisco" }, ] export default function JobsRecruiter() { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(null); return (

Jobs

{jobs.map((job, index) => { return })} {/* */}
{selected === null ?
No job selected
: <>

}
) }
